# MedLEA <img src="hexsticker/sticker.png" align="right" height="200"/>

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The  MedLEA package provides morphological and structural features of  471 medicinal plant leaves.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("SMART-Research/MedLEA")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example1}
library(MedLEA)
data("medlea")
head(medlea)
```

## Composition by Shape of Leaves

```{r example2, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
medlea %>% ggplot(aes(x=Shape)) + geom_bar() 

```
